products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a top-of-the-line smartphone with a powerful processor, high-resolution camera, and sleek design.

products.name: Maybelline Superstay Matte Ink Lipstick
products.description: This long-lasting lipstick provides bold color that stays put for up to 16 hours.

products.name: Organic Bananas
products.description: These organic bananas are grown without synthetic fertilizers or pesticides.

products.name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
products.description: This classic science fiction novel follows the misadventures of Arthur Dent as he travels the galaxy.
products.author: Douglas Adams

products.name: Apple MacBook Air
products.description: The MacBook Air is a lightweight and powerful laptop with a Retina display and long battery life.

products.name: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Mascara
products.description: This volumizing mascara provides bold lashes with a clump-free formula.

products.name: Organic Avocado
products.description: This organic avocado is packed with healthy fats and essential nutrients.

products.name: iPhone 13
products.description: The latest iPhone from Apple with a new A15 chip, improved camera system, and longer battery life.

products.name: L'Oreal Paris Mascara
products.description: Get longer, fuller, and bolder lashes with L'Oreal Paris Mascara.

products.name: Organic Apples
products.description: Fresh and juicy organic apples picked from local farms.

products.name: The Great Gatsby
products.description: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that explores themes of love, wealth, and decadence in the Roaring Twenties.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
products.description: Experience the ultimate noise-canceling headphones with the Sony WH-1000XM4. These headphones have industry-leading noise cancellation, smart listening features, and up to 30 hours of battery life.

products.name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+
products.description: Moisturize dry skin with Clinique's Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+. This lotion is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and provides all-day hydration.

products.name: Organic Whole Wheat Pasta
products.description: Enjoy a healthy and delicious meal with Organic Harvest's Whole Wheat Pasta. Made with only two organic ingredients, this pasta is a great source of fiber and nutrients.

products.name: The Lean Startup
products.author: Eric Ries
products.description: Learn how to build a successful startup with Eric Ries' The Lean Startup. This book provides a step-by-step guide to developing and launching a new product or service.
